summary: A triumph over adversity. Based on the true story of the 1996 Thailand National Champion Volleyball Team.
cast: Jesdaporn Pholdee|Sahaphap Tor|Ekachai Buranapanit|Giorgio Maiocchi|Chaichan Nimpulsawasdi|Kokkorn Benjathikoon|Shiriohana Hongsopon|Phomsit Sitthijamroenkhun|Sutthipong Sitthijamroenkhun|Anucha Chatkaew
title: Las chicas de acero
